DOC.detailed_description: A randomized trial , hospital primary care clinic , 24 week , 168 opioid-dependent subject , maintain buprenorphine 3x/week , counsel Standard Enhanced Medical Management . SMM brief intervention similar provide primary practitioner patient chronic medical condition diabetes . EMM intervention provide education recovery process advice lifestyle change 12-step participation . Outcome measure include reduction opioid use abstinence opioids , document 3x/week urine test self report .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Subjects meet FDA criterion opioid agonist maintenance treatment DSMIV criterion opioid dependence eligible study . Women childbearing age include provided agree adequate contraception monthly pregnancy monitor throughout study . Exclusion criterion include : pregnancy , current dependence alcohol , benzodiazepines sedative ; current suicide homicide risk ; current psychotic disorder major depression ; inability read understand English ; lifethreatening unstable medical problem .
